TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IEntityEntryGraphIterator
.class public interface auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit IEntityEntryGraphIterator

Docs.summary: A service to traverse a graph of entities and perform some action on at each node.

remarks.para: The service lifetime is . This means a single instance is used by many instances. The implementation must be thread-safe. This service cannot depend on services registered as .
See Tracking entities in EF Core for more information and examples.
